mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no noticeNo, n.writer_emp_no writerEmpNo, n.dpt_no dptNo, n.title title, n.content content, DATE_FORMAT(n.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') createDatetime, n.update_datetime updateDatetime, n.type type, e.emp_name name, g.dpt_name superiorDptName, g.superior_dpt_no superiorDptNo FROM notice n INNER JOIN emp e ON n.writer_emp_no = e.emp_no INNER JOIN `group` g ON e.dpt_no = g.dpt_no WHERE (g.superior_dpt_no = (SELECT superior_dpt_no FROM `group` WHERE dpt_no = #{dptNo}) AND n.type = '부서') OR n.type ='전사원' ORDER BY n.create_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
